info.author: Eric-Canas
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.name: usb-monitor
info.summary: USBMonitor is an easy-to-use cross-platform library for USB device monitoring that simplifies tracking of connections, disconnections, and examination of connected device attributes on both Windows and Linux, freeing the user from platform-specific details or incompatibilities.

info.name: usb-monitor
